Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.example Description

Example of a data interfaces push control pattern.

The package fr.upmc.components.plugins.dipc.example illustrates the a component data interfaces push control pattern implemented with the data interfaces push control BCM plug-in.

Description

The example uses two components, the server component which will produce and push data to a client component. The server component holds the server-side push control plug-in implementing the methods that control the pushes of the data while the client component holds the client-side plug-in that provides a convenient and black-box functionality to call the server-side push control services through BCM ports and connectors.

In this simple example, the pushed data are integer pairs exchanged through the standard DataOfferedI and DataRequiredI data interfaces by merely extending their DataI interfaces by the interface PairDataI, which is implemented by the class IntPair defined in the ServerComponent component definition class.
